name: VoiceTag
0:
”Alexa, open voice tag”
”Alexa, open voice tag for Eagle Cars”
”Alexa, ask voice tag how I can get my own voice tag”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice tag
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to VoiceTag. The fast, simple and brand new way to connect with a business, tradesperson or event. Get information and contact details sent straight to your phone. 

Maybe you've seen a voice tag mentioned on the side of a plumber's van or even a taxi while you've been driving. Or you've seen a voice tag in a newspaper advertisement. Voice tags are easier to remember than a phone number, email or a web address. 

Just ask the VoiceTag skill to lookup the voice tag you've seen and get the info.
